posts.postText:
I heard this from Mudkip and thought it was the best idea i had ever heard. You guys should replace the jihad sound (the alalalalalala) one with Udanes laugh.

 ITS FUN FOR ALL AGES!
I support this with every bone in my body.

+1
I think we're all being very serious here, let's get this done.
Holy fuck i would never stop playing ttt

One side says this will end up being very creepy... on side says it would be awesome to be part of the jihad icon.
Im sure on one point though, good luck getting my laugh and my laugh alone.
I would always use the jihad if this happened.

>> I would always use the jihad if this happened. 
Could you imagine three at once? o.0
Could you imagine Quack's jihad spam that he sometimes plays?
MASTERBALL!

@dum *BOOM*


Sounds like a great idea. Oh wait..I CAME UP WITH IT Lolol
Added a poll. As if we needed that though lol
Guys, Im going to run fraps whenever I'm on TTT, just to capture the laugh.

BUT WAIT, Now we can do this, thanks to FRAPS, and myself:
 http://www.mediafire.com/?83c3r4b7ba9a34x 


EDIT: Sorry for the double post, didn't see it -.-

LOL GJ Funny
glad you got one WITHOUT me laughing over it lol.

Implement this now.
 Only  reason I'd ever play TTT.
Funnyraff...you are a god.
This needs to happen.... right now.
You know you can change sounds yourself on console side...

>> You know you can change sounds yourself on console side... 
Make a guide for us console noobies.
I'm so going to just start laughing randomly to throw you guys off now.
We have no problem with you laughing more
I completely agree, Udanes laugh should be the new Jihad sound.

>> I completely agree, Udanes laugh should be the new Jihad sound. 


This is a little old, but I still agree.

Or, if you get a jihad-upgrade it makes all your jihads from the standard ALALAALAALA to the "AHAHAHAHHAHAHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA" by Udane.

I replaced my own jihad sound with Udane's laugh. Best thing ever.


Edit: And THIS is my 300th post. lmao.

In case anyone missed Overclocking's guide to changing jihad sounds I will post it here. They are very closely related.
 http://www.nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=3039&p=24224

I'd say don't replace it for the server, but we should sticky a guide on how to replace it yourself.

That way new members won't be confused.
Like mine? http://nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=3039
if people paid a small amount of attention they would of known the post has been up for months. Guess this shows no one looks at forum posts ;)

I think I know someone already that has his jihad sound set as udane's laugh lol
